author: Not available
source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry

text.0: Ic eom halgungboc;      healde hine dryhten
text.1: þe me fægere þus      frætewum belegde.
text.2: þureð to þance      þus het me wyrcean,
text.3: to loue and to wurðe,      þam þe leoht gesceop.
text.5: þæs þe he on foldan      gefremian mæg,
text.7: þæs þe he on gemynde      madma manega
text.9: and he sceal ece lean      ealle findan
text.10: þæs þe he on foldan      fremaþ to ryhte.
